title: How to Complete a Mortal Kombat Finisher

steps.headline: Pick your character, game, and learn their fatalities.
steps.description: They are many fatality lists on the internet, make sure you include which game it is and your character. Also, remember that MK 1,2, and 3 have easier to do fatalities. Also, Heroic brutalities can only be done in Mortal Kombat vs DC universe by the DC characters.

steps.headline: Work your way up.
steps.description: start with simple combos, then go into special moves, then into the large combos, then once you defeat the opponent try.

steps.headline: Keep trying 'til you do it.
steps.description: Play arcade and keep trying it when you defeat them, and the announcer says "finish him/her".

steps.headline: Other ways.
steps.description: In chess combat on MK: Deception you perform a fatality once you defeat the leader automatically with any character or class.

steps.headline: Remember  this can only be done on Mortal Kombat Deception.
steps.description: Also pick your character and find out their combination to do the finisher.

steps.headline: Learn how to time it.
steps.description: Once you've been defeated and the announcer says "finish him/her" try to press 5 random things before your opponent can finish you. It doesn't have to a hara-kiri, but you may get lucky and improve your timing attempting it.

steps.headline: Find the right opponent.
steps.description: You need somebody that won't finish you off as soon as they can. Have a friend help or use the first couple of arcade computer opponents. Remember you have to be defeated to attempt this.

steps.headline: Do it.
steps.description: Perform the hara-kiri and keep doing it until you get it right, this is the only way to get it right.

steps.headline: Other ways: Keep playing against the computer and if you get lucky they might do it.

text: Fatalities or Heroic Brutality Pick your character, game, and learn their fatalities. They are many fatality lists on the internet, make sure you include which game it is and your character. Also, remember that MK 1,2, and 3 have easier to do fatalities. Also, Heroic brutalities can only be done in Mortal Kombat vs DC universe by the DC characters. Work your way up. start with simple combos, then go into special moves, then into the large combos, then once you defeat the opponent try. Keep trying 'til you do it. Play arcade and keep trying it when you defeat them, and the announcer says "finish him/her". Other ways. In chess combat on MK: Deception you perform a fatality once you defeat the leader automatically with any character or class. Hara-Kiri Remember  this can only be done on Mortal Kombat Deception. Also pick your character and find out their combination to do the finisher. Learn how to time it. Once you've been defeated and the announcer says "finish him/her" try to press 5 random things before your opponent can finish you. It doesn't have to a hara-kiri, but you may get lucky and improve your timing attempting it. Find the right opponent. You need somebody that won't finish you off as soon as they can. Have a friend help or use the first couple of arcade computer opponents. Remember you have to be defeated to attempt this. Do it. Perform the hara-kiri and keep doing it until you get it right, this is the only way to get it right. Other ways: Keep playing against the computer and if you get lucky they might do it.  Brutality Realize a few things. A brutality is different from a heroic brutality. Also, it is a very hard to accomplish, it's a 11 button combo!, and isn't that satisfying. Find out if a brutality is even attempt able on one of your MK games. Try to be able to do a fatality or a hara-kiri before even trying this or else the chances of failure outweigh you. After reading over this continue. Work your way up. start with simple combos, then go into special moves, then into the large combos, and try to complete every large combo your character has. Split it up. practice it in parts, and try to add another button as you get better. Try it. Keep doing it, until you get it!
